website_summaries.verdict: No-spray waffle maker that meets performance expectations.
pros: Maintains consistent heat throughout the cooking process
Surprisingly easy to use despite technological sophistication
Customers love that kids can help make these waffles as well
cons: Be careful when using the highest setting, as waffles may burn

customer_reviews.title: Great Waffle Iron but.....
customer_reviews.text: This is the best waffle iron I've owned. The waffles come out absolutely delicious although it is a little slower to cook than I'm used to (perhaps why they are so good). There is one major drawback. You cannot place it on a counter with a cabinet above it. The unit is so big it will hit the cabinet and can't be opened. If you are going to buy this, make sure you have an island or a large space with nothing above it. If this isn't an issue you won't regret buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rohlfing

customer_reviews.title: Waffles and anything else you can think of!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been curious about a waffle maker for the last year so I surprised her with this one for the holidays. She loves it. Not only is she making these delicious gluten-free Belgium’s, she’s making sandwiches, quesadillas, eggs, hash browns and pretty much anything you can think of.. our only downside is an easy way to clean as the irons can not be removed. *tip - use a tea kettle, heat up water and pour into trays, let sit a bit and then pour out and wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: It's a Breville!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Breville small kitchen appliance (along with toaster oven and tea maker), and every one of them has been outstanding. I scoop 1/2 cup of batter into each section of the waffle iron, close the lid, wait for the beep, and the waffles cook perfectly. I've long been looking for a waffle iron that makes deep restaurant-style waffles, and finally I've found it. Clean up is a snap, just wipe out with a a cloth once it has cooled down a bit. Be aware the this appliance is large and heavy, but that's the trade-off for the job it does. I couldn't be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Polly Esther

customer_reviews.title: Breville is quality.
customer_reviews.text: We love this waffle maker. It may require a few times to adjust the setting to your liking but the waffles come out beautiful. Easy clean up. It does take up a bit of storage space so check the measurements before purchasing. If it is too big, they do make a smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Curran

customer_reviews.title: Great waffles!
customer_reviews.text: After going through about 5 different waffle makers over the years, this one ranks the best. The price is hard to swallow but the quality of construction, simple controls, well thought out design works really well for me. Granted, the size and weight will get you an initial stare from your spouse, but after eating crisp golden Belgium waffles, everything will be good. If you have a small kitchen/counter-top, you'll need to account for this. Cooking time is ~2 minutes at medium setting. We often have family dinner waffles every few weeks, and this unit can churn them out fast.
customer_reviews.author: John Bouchard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect waffles
customer_reviews.text: Our family has been looking for a really good waffle maker for a while now.and we have found what we needed with this one. It may be a bit expensive but it's worth every dollar. The waffles are crispy on the outside and fluffy.on the inside. It's been easy to use and super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Pale, unimpressive waffles - can’t brown at all
customer_reviews.text: Repeatedly failed - on even the darkest setting - to produce crisp waffles. Same exact waffle batter comes out flawlessly on my old KitchenAid. Returned to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jack F

customer_reviews.title: This thing is sweet
customer_reviews.text: I think I am about to gain some serious weight. I have had this thing for about a week and have made waffles 5 times. They are just so crispy and fluffy. I use level 2 which works out well for me. My mom was like you spent what on a waffle maker???!!!!! I was tired of the previous cheap ones I had that broke and mad soft waffles. I highly recommend this thing.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Breville Rocks
customer_reviews.text: We art totally sold on Breville products --- over the last six months we have replaced 4 small kitchen appliances with Breville. They work very well, and clearly though was put into "the little things" such as cleaning, the controls, etc.

customer_reviews.title: The KING of waffle makers!

customer_reviews.title: BEST WAFFLE 🧇 MAKER EVER!

I love that the waffles cook from the bottom up creating amazing nooks for butter and syrup. Its very easy to get the results you're looking for with the cooking settings. Every single waffle batter I've used in this thing has came out great. 10/10 would recommend! Breville makes great products

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly done /easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Every waffle per batch turns out exactly the same amount of doneness. Very easy to clean. I did not use spray oil. Be remnants just slide right out. Glad we spent the extra money on this unit.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Waffle Maker
customer_reviews.text: Our old waffle maker finally died after many, many years. I thought long and hard about investing the money this particular waffle maker cost, however, after looking at many others over an extended period of time, I decided to take a chance and invest in this piece of kitchen equipment. It was an excellent choice. It has many wonderful features, and you can make waffles from extremely dark and crispy to waffles that are very light and just slightly crispy. I would highly recommend investing your $$ in this particular waffle maker.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only did the waffle maker live up to our expectations they surpassed them. The instructions were very clear and easy to understand. We even tried the "Classic Waffle" recipe except we added a bit of cinnamon to ours and my family devoured them. We have 4 children plus one on the way and the table was eerily quiet when we began to eat. I may have to serve these more just for some peace at the table. You cannot go wrong with this waffle maker. I would have taken a picture of them but they were quickly consumed. My pregnant wife loved them plus the recipe. Happy wife, happy life!!!
customer_reviews.author: William Allen

customer_reviews.title: I am smart. I want to be smart. I am dumb.
customer_reviews.text: So the smart feature does not work. The cooking light does not come on and there is no magical 3 beep to alert you that there are no more steps between you and waffle. If I let this thing cook the waffle until it beeps I would hear my smoke detector screaming at me to get the hell out of the house or sleep on a cot in a gym for 6 months.

customer_reviews.title: The unit was defective out of the box

customer_reviews.title: it works just like it says

I highly recommend this waffle iron. It is worth the money

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Waffles Every Time
customer_reviews.text: We got two of these to use in our small cafe. They make perfect deep Belgium waffles. Leave them in a bit longer if you like them crispy. Yum. This would be perfect for home use as well.
customer_reviews.author: KPHawaii

customer_reviews.title: Not So Smart
customer_reviews.text: I used the different recipes provided by Breville. In all cases and with different settings, the waffles were crisp on the outside and soggy in the inside. This is the most disappointing Breville product I have purchased. Varying the thickness of the batter did not help. The best workaround was to leave the waffles in the maker for a couple of minutes after the cooking cycle ends. The nonstick feature works well, however.
customer_reviews.author: Picky in PA

product_meta.title: Breville BWM604BSS Smart Waffle Maker, Brushed Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: The smart waffle 4 slice meet the waffle maker that knows exactly how to turn batter into the precise creation your appetite desires. Turning sticky batter into golden brown goodness isn't always easy. Let the smart waffle do the thinking for you. Choose your waffle style, from light to dark and rest assured any overflow will get caught and cooked in the wrap around moat. No mess.
feature_bullets: WAFFLE IQ: Intelligent darkness control dials in your cooking time to perfectly suit the style you are cooking. With 5 different darkness settings and a manual option allows you to customize waffle color from light to dark.
BROWNING CONTROL: Crisp up your waffles to your liking from light to dark with 5 different settings.
NO MESS MOAT: Waffle batter has a tendency to spill out and onto your counter top, but with this thoughtful feature excess strays are under control.
THERMAL PRO EVEN HEAT: Say goodbye to extra crispy edges and raw batter pockets. The Smart Waffle Pro distributes heat evenly across cooking plates.
NON STICK SURFACE: Sticky batter will never stick to your cooking plates thanks to premium PFOA free non stick coating.
READY LIGHT: The Smart Waffle illuminates when it's ready for you to pour on the batter.
CONSTRUCTION MATERIALS: Stainless Steel Housing, Cast Aluminum Cooking Plates, Deep Cooking Plates for thicker, fluffier waffles.
